Name: NutrientManagementInformation
LabelText: Nutrient Management information

Name: BCNutrientManagementCalculator
LabelText: BC Nutrient Management Calculator

Name: MoistureMessage
LabelText: This value should be a percentage of the moisture contained in the material as received.  It should not be a dry matter value

Name: NitrogenMessage
LabelText: This value is the percentage of the manure/compost made up of total nitrogen (TN), which includes the organic and inorganic portions

Name: AmmoniaMessage
LabelText: This value is the portion of the manure/compost in the form of ammonium-nitrogen (NH4-N), an inorganic/mineral form of nitrogen. It may also be expressed in units of mg/kg or mg/L

Name: PhosphorousMessage
LabelText: This value is the percentage of the manure/compost made up of phosphorus (P)

Name: PotassiumMessage
LabelText: This value is the percentage of the manure compost made up potassium (K).

Name: AmmoniumRetensionMessage
LabelText: This value is an estimate of how much volatile ammoniums is retained in the manure after application.  Manure type, and the timing and method of application affect retention.

Name: AvailableOrganicNitrogenMessage
LabelText: This value is an estimate of how much of the stable organic nitrogen in manure will become available during the growing season.

Name: AvailableThisYearMessage
LabelText: These values represent the amount of nutrients available to the crop from the nutrient source during the growing season.  These will be added to the Agronomic Balance.

Name: AvailbleLongTermMessage
LabelText: These values represent the amount of nutrients added to the soil from the nutrient source.  These will be added to the Crop Removal Balance.
